review:
I had to wait for more than 90 minutes for my appointment.
Doctor had prescribed an injection for which the hospital put bed charge on my bill. Who outs bed charge just for an injection. *** ********** ** *********** **** *** **** ******* **** ******* ******* ********* ****** ******* ****** *********** **** ***** Had to consult another doctor.
